column4: leejunfan: so i have to use the entire install in expert mode?
or i have to do just that section in expert mode
_so what's the advantages of kubuntu over ubuntu?
interesting....although id be running flux not kde
but i use kde apps frequently though
LOL, nerds with their requisite software tagging prefixes
what is ubuntu's equivalent to mandrake control center?
leejunfan: well mandrake has bash too
i need something abit more advanced than mandrake, b/c i need a bit of a learning curve to get me exploring
Everything has worked out of the box for me.
but archlinux seems just a bit too far out for me right now
you can learn on any linux system.
